thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com | 22 di 549
thread.title: steve

author: steve
title: steve
text: I was nervous to initially order here, but the prices were so much less than in department stores that I had to give it a try. After ordering, I promptly got an email confirming everything, and the next day I got an email with shipping information. When the item arrived (Christian Dior sunglasses), they were authentic and brand new, as advertised. I have since ordered about six more pair of sunglasses for my wife and I, and every time I have received fast shipping and the right product. Order with confidence!
